# sumoresponser

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of sumoresponser is to automate the analysis of response in a time series due to (sudden) change in another.

## Installation

You can install the development version of sumoresponser from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("vidarsumo/sumoresponser")
```

## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r example}
library(sumoresponser)
## basic example code
```
